title: How much blue essence did you other old time players end up with?
body:
I've got 74000, every champ and not enough skill to earn mastery tokens lol

Not to mention 12 champion shards ranging from warwick at 90 blue essence to gnar giving 1260 BE

Shame it doesn't help me with my 3x legendary skins conundrum.
